snippet: Baseball investigators are talking to associates of Anthony Bosch, whose anti-aging clinic is at the center of a major doping scandal. A few associates have doubts about his suspected involvement.
abstract: Analysis; determining the truth of accusations regarding use of performance-enhancing drugs is proving to be a more difficult task than anticipated; investigators are now talking to associates of Anthony Bosch, whose Miami-based anti-aging clinic is at center of a major doping scandal.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

lead_paragraph: Baseball investigators are talking to associates of Anthony Bosch, whose anti-aging clinic is at the center of a major doping scandal. A few associates have doubts about his suspected involvement.

headline.seo: Baseball Inquiries About Banned Substances Also Raise Some Doubts
headline.main: Doubts About Players and Suspected Drug Provider
headline.print_headline: Doubts About Players but Also About Accusations
